src.run module¶

class src.run.DictWithDefaults(user_config: Dict, default_config: Dict)¶

Bases: object

class src.run.Run(data: pathlib.Path)¶

Bases: object

Run the pipeline end to end

data: pathlib.Path

The path to the data folder

export(export_args: Dict) → None¶

Export the data

export_args: dict

A dictionary of format {dataset: [{variable_1 arguments}, {variable_2 arguments]} for all the variables to be exported

process(preprocess_args: Dict) → None¶

preprocess the data

subset; assign coordinates (latitude/longitude/time); regrid; resample timesteps;

preprocess_args:
